item.description: The Wolf Den Tower of Power is a musical force, delivering a high-energy performance every time they hit the stage. With their in-your-face brass and Funk combination, Tower of Power continues to astound audiences all over the world with "What Is Hip." Visit Event Website *Come early. Seating is limited. Must be 21 or older. Food and drinks are served in the Wolf Den. I will be there by 4:30 to stand in line. Mohegan Sun informed me I cannot hold seats at a table for people not with me. We can take turns standing in line as long as the folks behind us don't mind. This will be a fun night and as Sandy pointed out below in the comments there is dancing etc for those interested. Looking forward to seeing all of you!!
item.how_to_find_us: Met us at the entrance to the Wolf Den!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Tower of Power FREE Concert at the Wolf Den, Mohegan Sun
